name: Beef Mushroom Stroganoff
description: Creamy mushroom sauce with tender beef strips. A classic comfort dish made healthier with Greek yogurt.

instructions.instruction: Season beef strips with salt and pepper. Dust with flour.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over high heat.
Sear beef strips in batches until browned. Set aside.
instructions.tip: Don't overcrowd the pan for best browning.

instructions.instruction: In the same pan, saut√© onion until softened, about 4 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook until golden, about 5 minutes.
instructions.tip: Let mushrooms brown without stirring initially.

instructions.instruction: Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds.
Pour in beef broth, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Return beef to the pan. Reduce heat to low.
Remove from heat. Stir in Greek yogurt until smooth.
instructions.tip: Adding yogurt off heat prevents curdling.

tips: Greek yogurt is a lighter alternative to sour cream.
Beef provides iron and B12 for energy.
Can be made ahead and reheated gently.
For extra creaminess, add a splash of heavy cream.
storageInfo: Refrigerate for up to 3 days. Reheat gently over low heat.
servingSuggestion: Serve over egg noodles, rice, or mashed potatoes.
variations: Can be made with chicken as well.
Add cream for a richer version.
